subject: Hockey, Ice
Apologies
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for a man accused of throwing a banana at a black N.H.L. player says his client deeply regrets what he did and had no idea his actions could be seen as racist.
snippet: The lawyer for a man accused of throwing a banana at a black N.H.L. player says his client deeply regrets what he did and had no idea his actions could be seen as racist.
